lines.text: ...If somehow that table getting set on fire did trigger a summoning ritual...
...Hm. What sort of demon would make one loud gunshot noise, and kill two people?
I was thinking maybe one of the Seven Stakes of Purgatory, but they're usually noisier...
Any of the lapiniforms from Pendragon's Memorial Army could pull off a two-for-one like that...
Or maybe that one demon, the 33rd ranked, who makes holes in things...?
What're you bangin' on about now?
...No, don't mind me. I don't think it fits.
The table's not really elaborate enough for any of those summonings, and...
...none of those things I mentioned, really... 'exist'.
Great. Waste more of my time, why don'tcha.
